column3: I can remember when I was a baby and my mother was there watching the show. I went and bought 100 episodes and watched them. I respect it so much that the sitcom itself and Ed Norton; I'm not playing Ed Norton but my version of it, cause I'm a black man.

The sum of the whole is plainly this: The nature of man considered in his single capacity, and with respect only to the present world, is adapted and leads him to attain the greatest happiness he can for himself in the present world.

You have to discipline your children, or they won't respect you, law enforcement or God or anyone else.
The most important phase of living with a person is respect for that person as an individual.
Go up close to your friend, but do not go over to him! We should also respect the enemy in our friend.
I owe my success to having listened respectfully to the very best advice, and then going away and doing the exact opposite.
Respect yourself if you would have others respect you.
I'm sick of just liking people. I wish to God I could meet somebody I could respect.

Assuredly, Loving Souls, you should go to God with all humility and respect, humbling yourselves in His presence, especially when you remember your past ingratitude and sins.
